text: Labo abadla inzalo angeke bakwazi ukuma (ngosuku lokuvuka kwabafileyo) ngaphandle kwanjengokuma komuntu oshawe usathane(ukushawa) kwamholelaekuhlanyenilokhokungenxa yokuthi bona bathi ukuhweba kuyafana nje (nokwenza) inzalo kodwa uMvelinqangi wakwenza kwaba yimvume ukuhwebelana wasekwenza kwangabi yimvume ukwenza inzalo (ukuzalanisa imali), lowo osefikelwe ukuholeka okuvela eNkosini yakhe bese kuphela okwakhe yilokho osekwadlula, futhi udaba lwakhe likuMvelinqangi futhi noma ngabe ubani ophindela (ekuzalaniseleni imali) labo-ke bangabanqwamani nomlilo bona bayokuba kuwona ingunaphakade
